# About Cheriven
## ABOUT US:
Cheriven empowerment foundation is a Nigeria Non-profit, Non-religious, Non-political Organization founded by kind hearted people to give hope to the less privileged and vulnerable in the society. Our Organization is determined to alleviate poverty and ensure sustainable livelihood for the poor.

Our Foundation is committed to improvising the lives of the most vulnerable in the society which include people with disability, widows, women in distress, street children, etc.
Our services include vocational training, skills acquisition, Securing Scholarship for the needy, graduate training, etc.

## OUR MISSION 
We work with communities and individuals to alleviate poverty of rural people, extend charity to the most vulnerable and empower citizen striving to exercise their human rights and sustainable livelihoods.

## OUR VISION 
Faithful commitment to peace, social justice and sustainable development; where all people live together with mutual respect and without recourse to any form of violence to resolve conflict.
